title: Get out while you can, Account Transfers are back!!!

body:
**Account Transfers will be back with Patch 8.2 at a Discounted Rate of 50% off**

As stated in the article linked, account transfers will go live again once Patch 8.2 drops. There will also be a 50% discount active until Feb 6th @ 11AM PST! With the amount of transfers happening all at once, we do anticipate that they *may* take a little longer than usual to process. Please be patient with transfers when it first comes up!

Couple things to point out to help alleviate any confusion:

- If you have finished your placements before transferring, you will need to play one placement game to be placed on the new server
- If you have not finished placements, you will likely need to start a new round of 10 placements


_**UPDATE:**_ We got a little more info regarding when transfers will go live...

> Please note that this won't be activated immediately, as we need all servers to be on the same patch before this can be enabled - as well as giving a little time for the "patch dust" to settle and keep an eye out for any critical issues - so don't panic if you don't see it immediately! ^_^
